live_updates: Services are still disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area. Further updates will continue in the morning.
39829.summary: Some customers in Montecito and Lochdale areas of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39829.title: July 21 – Burnaby (Montecito & Lochdale) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
